caption: Two men and a woman is watching a performance while several actors and actresses are performing. The performance is really wonderful and dangerous, somebody is nearly being shot by an arrow. One of the men leave and enter the room for the actors. He is searching for something there. He finds yellow bottles, but then he is attacked. He fights with the attacker, but he is defeated. At that time then woman beat the attacker and they run away. Then arrive in their home and start a conversation. They try to find something to eat in their home, but they fail.
